raw_body: Wife of late Philip Anandappa, loving mother of Mariette and Edgar Tavarayan, Marion and Eileen Anandappa (USA) and Agnes, darling Nana of Melissa and Keith, Eymard and Thashni, Megan, Jason (USA), much loved grandnana of Malia, Kayla, Evyan and Tiyen, beloved sister of Neville and Barbara Perumal, expired. Cortege leaves residence No. 2/1, St. Lucia’s Street, Kotahena 10.00 a.m. Friday 10th November burial General Cemetery, Kanatta R.C. Section.
